steps.intention: Identify birth years from image text
steps.note: Extract birth years from the image text to determine how many are after 1945.

steps.code: birth_years = [1938, 1946, 1950, 1944, 1947]; count_after_1945 = sum(1 for year in birth_years if year > 1945)

steps.intention: Provide the final count as the answer
